data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Stavropol' to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Stavropol‘, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,758,629 lost in Stavropol' that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Stavropol‘, Russia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Stavropol‘, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Stavropol' to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Balkar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Balkar people know you.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Stavropol' words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 40,971 believers in Stavropol' and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Stavropol' an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Stavropol'
